Description: This registry defines the Update Service messages for Redfish

DownloadFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is downloading firmware image file from Remote Server.
DownloadFirmware.Message: Device is downloading firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

DownloadFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device download firmware image file from Remote Server failed.
DownloadFirmwareFailed.Message: Device download firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

DownloadFirmwareSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device download firmware image file from Remote Server successfully.
DownloadFirmwareSuccessful.Message: Device download firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

FirmwareUpdateCompleted.Description: Indicates that device firmware update is completed.

FirmwareUpdateFailed.Description: Indicates that device firmware update is failed.

FlashFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is flashing firmware.
FlashFirmware.Message: Device is flashing firmware for action %1.

FlashFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device flash firmware update failed.
FlashFirmwareFailed.Message: Device flash firmware update for action %1 failed.

InvalidExtensionType.Description: The extension is invalid for this operation.
InvalidExtensionType.Message: The extension %1 is not allowed for parameter %2 in this operation %3.
InvalidExtensionType.Resolution: Correct the parameter file extension for the operation and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

InvalidFileVariable.Description: The file contains an invalid key that is not compatible for this operation.
InvalidFileVariable.Message: The key %1 is not a valid parameter for the parameter file %2 in operation %3.
InvalidFileVariable.Resolution: Correct the parameter file for the file and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Description: Indicates that uploaded firmware image is not a valid one.
InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Message: The uploaded %1 is not a valid firmware image.
InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid firmware image.

InvalidSignKeyFormat.Description: Indicates that uploaded signed key is not a valid one.
InvalidSignKeyFormat.Message: The uploaded %1 is not a valid signed key. Acceptable signed key extension is .pem
InvalidSignKeyFormat.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid signed key.

InvalidVariableValue.Description: Indicates that a key value given in the file is invalid and not compatible for this operation.
InvalidVariableValue.Message: The value, %1, for parameter, %2, in key input, %3, for action %4 is not valid.
InvalidVariableValue.Resolution: Correct the value for the key for the file and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

MalformedJSONFile.Description: Indicates that the file given is a malformed JSON File.  Could be duplicate, syntax error, etc.
MalformedJSONFile.Message: The file, %1, submitted is a malformed JSON file and could not be parsed successfully by the receiving service.
MalformedJSONFile.Resolution: Ensure that the file sent is a proper valid JSON file and resubmit the request.

MethodNotAllowed.Description: Indicates that the HTTP method for the request is not supported when update mode.
MethodNotAllowed.Message: The method %1 is not allowed when update mode.

NoFileExisted.Description: There is no file for the required parameter and the operation cannot continue.
NoFileExisted.Message: There is no file of the required parameter %1 for this operation %2.
NoFileExisted.Resolution: Include file of the required parameter for the operation and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

PrepareFlashArea.Description: Indicates that device is preparing flash area for firmware update.
PrepareFlashArea.Message: Device is preparing flash area for action %1.

PrepareFlashAreaFailed.Description: Indicates that device prepare flash area failed.
PrepareFlashAreaFailed.Message: Device prepare flash area for action %1 failed.

PrepareFlashAreaSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device prepare flash area successfully.
PrepareFlashAreaSuccessful.Message: Device prepare flash area for action %1 successfully.

PrepareUpdate.Description: Indicates that device is preparing firmware update.
PrepareUpdate.Message: Device is preparing flash firmware for action %1.

RequiredKeyParametersMissing.Description: The required parameter is missing/undefined and the operation cannot continue.
RequiredKeyParametersMissing.Message: The required parameter, %1, is missing/undefined for this operation %2.
RequiredKeyParametersMissing.Resolution: Include the required parameter for the operation and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

RequiredValueParametersMissing.Description: A required value is missing, undefined, or an invalid type, and the operation cannot continue.
RequiredValueParametersMissing.Message: In the key, %1, the required value for parameter, %2, is missing, undefined, or an invalid type, for this operation %3.
RequiredValueParametersMissing.Resolution: Include the required value for the operation and resubmit the request if the operation failed.

StartFirmwareUpdate.Description: Indicates that action was submitted to do firmware update.
StartFirmwareUpdate.Message: The action %1 was submitted to do firmware update.

UnnecessaryParameter.Description: The request data contains unnecessary parameter.
UnnecessaryParameter.Message: The parameter %1 is unnecessary in operation %2.
UnnecessaryParameter.Resolution: Remove the unnecessary parameter in request data.

VerifyFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is verifying firmware image file.
VerifyFirmware.Message: Device is verifying firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

VerifyFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device verify firmware image file failed.
VerifyFirmwareFailed.Message: Device verify firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

VerifyFirmwareSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device verify firmware image file successfully.
VerifyFirmwareSuccessful.Message: Device verify firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

VerifySignKey.Description: Indicates that device is verifying sign key file.
VerifySignKey.Message: Device is verifying sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

VerifySignKeyFailed.Description: Indicates that device verify sign key file failed.
VerifySignKeyFailed.Message: Device verify sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

VerifySignKeySuccessful.Description: Indicates that device verify sign key file successfully.
VerifySignKeySuccessful.Message: Device verify sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

Name: Update Service Message Registry
